#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define gc getchar
typedef long long int ll;
using namespace std;
int read_int() {
char c = gc();
while(c<'0' || c>'9') c = gc();
int ret = 0;
while(c>='0' && c<='9') {
ret = 10 * ret + c - 48;
c = gc();
}
return ret;
}
int main()
{
    ll t,n,m,i;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        cin>>n>>m;
        ll a[n],s1=0,s2=0;
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            cin>>a[i];
        }
        sort(a,a+n);
        for(i=0;i<m;i++)
        {
            s1+=a[i];
        }
        for(i=m;i<n;i++)
        {
            s2+=a[i];
        }
        cout<<abs(s2-s1)<<"\n";
    }
    return 0;
}
